actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill amending the conveyance of property to Mountrail County Park Commission, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits a portion of the lands conveyed to the Mountrail County Park Commission in North Dakota, pursuant to the Water Resources Development Act of 1974, to be used for the leasing of cabin sites.

titles.title: A bill amending the conveyance of property to Mountrail County Park Commission, North Dakota, and for other purposes.
